author: Mark Ford
comment: I use a LG watch GR but cannot get this app to change cams?  How, swiping does nothing.  Nice app, just needs some instructions or better working with different devices. Any help?
title: Need instructions for changing cams

author: Norman Lau
comment: Thanks. But can it support https?  For security reason, I get the snapshots from cam and put them on a web server instead of allowing direct Internet access to cam. It will be great if https can work for hiding the path when I am using public WiFi.
title: Works fine

author: ANURAN SEN
comment: Please load some basic instructed videos on youtube for how to setup ? I am using wifi cam via android phone. Stock app works fine. Only issue with your app on android wear.

author: Dan Kumm
comment: I love this but it keeps freezing on my moto 360 after a few seconds of use until I restart the watch.
title: Like it but freezes

author: Johnny Cheuk
comment: Ok now I figured it now, I can swipe up/down to select view different ip cam.  Next phase please add PTZ motion control in the Android Wear too.  Nice app!!

reply.author: Barkside Apps
reply.content: The watch shows all captured images when they are ready. Try some different cameras, and be sure to test them on the phone first.

title: Working fine

author: eric messenger
comment: This is a really cool app and we'll made. I would love auto updating on a set interval or something but it is not need for the situation I use it for. I use foscams with the jpeg cgi URL which works great.
title: This is awesome and works great

author: Mark Edgar-Pitt
comment: Have used similar apps, however this one I cannot get to work.  Not good.

author: Mike R
comment: Works flawlessly! Gives me access to to my favorite IP cameras right on my moto 360! I would pay $0.99 for this app! Thank you to the developers who provide this for free.
title: Perfect!

author: Marvyn Hortman
comment: App works great with foscam IP cameras. Don't forget to hold tap and you can pinch zoom in on the image on your watch!
title: Great app great developer!

author: Jonas Johansson
comment: Not to intuitive or good looking but works just fine!
title: Works fine

author: Barry Kobren
comment: I can use it to see all three of my home cameras on my Moto 360. Developer was great in helping making it work.

reply.author: Barkside Apps
reply.content: Glad to hear you got it working!

title: Works great.

author: None None
comment: Can only take snapshots of a feed. No live feed option.

author: Brian salmon
comment: 5 stars will be give if it could be updated to live viewing.
title: It works well

author: Wayne Ward
comment: Works great on the lg R watch just say open IP cam
title: Works great

author: Nic Nic
comment: Not working

author: Hennie Le Roux
comment: Works as advertised. Live view would be nice.

author: Sean Novak
comment: Simple and works

author: Jason Salas
comment: This is really fun to use and is a tremendous service that exhibits data syncing between handheld and wearable devices. I'm currently using this to see what the foot traffic is like at the food court for the mall right up the street from me.  Really good job!
title: GREAT implementation of data syncing

author: Alexey Vasilyev
comment: I like it!
title: Nice implementation

author: Andrew Henderson
comment: I got a cubot
